name: Dodge the Creeps (Sean Henry Lewis)
description:
Dodge the Creeps Game Submission for CS329E w/ Dr. Toprac
I added some extra things.

- Pause System:  Have a really high score and need to take a break? Press Escape.
- High Scores: Your highest score is automatically saved to memory! Go beat it!
- Idle Animation: The original game doesn't do idle animations, so I added them in.
- Stylized game: Enjoy a nicer looking space-themed game
- Parallax Background: It also may speed up depending on your score, how fast can you make it go? 

The assets for this game that are used are all open source, below are the credits to the original creators! :)

  • Simple Shoot-'em-Up Sprites by Gamedevtuts
  • Dodge the Creeps Asset Pack by Godot Engine
